title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point - the fall/burning/destruction/loss/sack of Troy/the city; ambush on Troy/the city; attack/invasion of the Greeks from the Trojan Horse; arrival/acceptance of the (Trojan) horse into Troy/the city; admittance of the Trojan Horse
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point maximum

1 point - the fall/burning/destruction/loss/sack of Troy/the city; ambush on Troy/the city; attack/invasion of the Greeks from the Trojan Horse; arrival/acceptance of the (Trojan) horse into Troy/the city; admittance of the Trojan Horse

Student response earns one of the available points.

1 point maximum

1 point - the fall/burning/destruction/loss/sack of Troy/the city; ambush on Troy/the city; attack/invasion of the Greeks from the Trojan Horse; arrival/acceptance of the (Trojan) horse into Troy/the city; admittance of the Trojan Horse
